TopicTitle: Mod to reset docking ports so you can redock without moving the docks more than a meter a day

Articles.Content: I am guessing it would be another tweakable on the right click for the docking port just like decouple node? Except it just resets the port as if it had moved more than a meter away. This would help with station wheels and other moving parts that rely on the docking ports to undock so they can move but then redock when the movement is finished.
